name: Transient Global Amnesia
chief_complaint: I can't remember what happened this morning, and I keep asking the same questions over and over.
physical_findings: Normal neurological exam except for memory deficits
No focal motor or sensory deficits
prognosis: Excellent, typically resolves within 24 hours with no lasting effects
description: A temporary, sudden-onset episode of memory loss that can't be attributed to a more common neurological condition. Patients remain alert and retain personal identity but cannot form new memories during the episode.
risk_factors: Recent physical exertion or emotional stress
